## Tender Notice
#### PASS SA - Internal Audit

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01014967
* **Solicitation Number:** 17669309/A (RE-ISSUE)

### Description
The [Department of National Defence](#contracting-Entity) invites all PASS SA holders holding a valid PASS SA for Stream 1: Internal Audit at the time of bid closing to submit a proposal in response to this solicitation.

### Requirements
The Department of National Defence seeks to establish a contract under the Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement to:

* Develop an environmental risk assessment framework
* Perform risk assessments to produce a multi-year environmental audit plan

### Eligibility
Only PASS SA holders currently holding a PASS SA for Stream 1: Internal Audit in all required resource categories in the National Capital Region are eligible to compete.

### Accessible Procurement
The Department of National Defence aims to ensure that the goods and services procured by the Government of Canada are inclusive and accessible by design and default.

### Instructions to Bidders
* All questions related to this solicitation must be sent via email to Jason Solomon at [jason.solomon@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jason.solomon@forces.gc.ca).
* The solicitation document is available in PDF format only.
